description: The purpose of this module is to highlight the role of women as leaders and also the role of Leadership within organizations for creating an environment where DEI initiatives can thrive.

subcategories.name: Caselet 2 | A Determined Saleswoman in Peshawar | 25 Min
Article 1 | Management Women and the New Facts of Life | 20-25 Min
Article 2 | Leaders Aren't Taking Ownership of Diversity Initiatives, DEI Pros Say | 10 Min
Article 3 | 10 Reasons Why DEI Efforts Fail (And How to Ensure They Succeed) | 15-20 Min
TEDx Talk | How Diversity Makes Teams More Innovative | Rocio Lorenzo | 15 Min
